snippet: A lawyer said Thursday that Miami lineman Jonathan Martin endured harassment that went far beyond the traditional locker room hazing.
abstract: NFL Roundup; lawyer for Jonathan Martin, Miami Dolphins offensive tackle who accused guard Richie Incognito of bullying, says problem is not lack of toughness on Martin’s part, but his treatment by his teammates; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer said Thursday that Miami lineman Jonathan Martin endured harassment that went far beyond the traditional locker room hazing.

headline.main: Lawyer for Dolphin Says Toughness Isn’t the Issue
headline.print_headline: Lawyer for Dolphin Says Toughness Isn’t Issue
